Author: VLB_token
Title: [ANN] [ICO] VLB - Vehicle Lifecycle Blockchain
Body: ICO is closed We would like to thank everyone for taking part in our ICO, which ends on April 9, 2018. We’re extremely grateful for the support our project received from people who joined us at the earlier stage and people who invested during the ICO. We appreciate all your shared opinions and ideas on how to make our project better.  However, as it currently stands, we have not been successful in getting our message across to the broader community. We weren’t successful in attracting immediate funding including one from big players on automotive market who need lots of time to include our project in their scope for upcoming years, so we have to announce closing of our ICO. At this moment we are not planning to resume it in the near future. The smart contract of the ICO is a binding agreement that we’ve entered into with our token buyers and the ICO is continuing in accordance with the terms set in code until April 9, 2018. If the soft cap of $4 000 000 isn’t reached, we will return all the funds to our token buyers. You can find a detailed instruction how to get a refund will be posted soon. We will be happy to answer any questions via our Telegram Channel (https://t.me/vlb_token)  24/7 — don’t hesitate to reach out.

Author: VLB_token
Title: [ANN] [ICO] VLB - Vehicle Lifecycle Blockchain
Body: The Vehicle Lifecycle Blockchain will initially be fully implemented within the VLB early auto industry participants’ ecosystem, which includes the CarFix network of repair shops, test mode for car manufacturers, insurance  companies, spare parts distributors, and fleet management companies. However, the true mass-market potential of this blockchain lies in its decentralized deployment beyond the initial ecosystem. So, basically, it will start in Russia, but we have plans to integrate project all around the world, in next few years.

Body: as far as i understood, purchases will be made between businesses, f.e. between the manufacturer and the insurance company, or the manufacturer of spare parts. there's a marketplace creating around that database, the companies will buy information about cars from each other.

Author: VLB_token
Title: [ANN] [ICO] VLB - Vehicle Lifecycle Blockchain
Body: Data consumers are individuals or other businesses that will use VLB for the purpose of viewing all necessary information in regards to a particular car/driver/spare part/repair shop/etc. with 100% confidence that this information is and always will be accurate and complete.  Data Owners will pay small fractions of VLB Tokens to record and broadcast information on the blockchain and receive payments in larger amounts of VLB Tokens for access to this data from data consumers via smart contract or get compensated otherwise in case of freely broadcasted data, depending on their business rationale.

Author: VLB_token
Title: [ANN] [ICO] VLB - Vehicle Lifecycle Blockchain
Body: For decades the automotive industry remained, in many ways, one of the most advanced industries in the world. However, the technologies are accelerating, and the consumer mindset is rapidly shifting from an ownership-centric model to a service-centric demand. The pace of change often exceeds the markets' ability to adapt, adding to the known operational inefficiencies.   That means the industry is ready to be disrupted—in a good way. More importantly, a smart player has a chance to join or even lead this disruption, greatly multiplying his potential benefits. And that’s what the Vehicle Lifecycle Blockchain is created for. Read our new story on Medium https://medium.com/vlb-token/join-the-disruption-and-win-what-vehicle-lifecycle-blockchain-brings-to-businesses-7803fdafac90

Author: VLB_token
Title: [ANN] [ICO] VLB - Vehicle Lifecycle Blockchain
Body: We are decreasing the number of VLB tokens to ever be released from 175 million to 100 million. That means that the number of tokens released for ICO (VLB 30 mln.) will constitute 30% of the overall token amount created for the VLB ecosystem, as opposed to 17% as initially planned.  You can check the token burning transaction here https://etherscan.io/tx/0x598d5fb285696564c302355cc7aa5ca6b7f82457d4af1b2195bab5311e352c67  This decision has been taken to re-assure the ICO participants that there will never be a possibility for future price manipulations. Tokens for the future rounds of funding will be stored on escrow account / smart-contact in order to guarantee their safekeeping. We are reducing the quantity of tokens, because we are confident that in this case we will complete all the tasks that these tokens were reserved for initially: the funding of the project and pulling in professional market players.  For more information please read our article on Medium https://medium.com/vlb-token/we-are-burning-75-million-tokens-vlb-ab03f92efd5e

Author: VLB_token
Title: [ANN] [ICO] VLB - Vehicle Lifecycle Blockchain
Body: By applying blockchain technology to the ecosystem we can ensure information symmetry and reduce costs of each transaction between all the parties. Author: VLB_token
Title: [ANN] [ICO] VLB - Vehicle Lifecycle Blockchain
Body: Hello, thanks for your support! You're right, VLB is a utility-token. VLB Tokens help to reduce the costs of VLB participants (car manufacturers, car services, insurance companies, etc.) and help them to grow their topline. Some participants will be able to save more, and some less, you can see our analysis in the White Paper. The token's price will grow depending on the savings and growing revenues of each participant.

Author: VLB_token
Title: [ANN] [ICO] VLB - Vehicle Lifecycle Blockchain
Body: By now, you have probably heard every now and then how great blockchain was and how it would disrupt almost every industry, far beyond its original domain of financial transactions. But how does the automotive industry come into play? And how exactly a regular car owner, or even a passenger, will benefit from the technology? Read our post on Medium https://medium.com/vlb-token/how-the-use-of-blockchain-in-the-automotive-industry-will-benefit-you-personally-a130350e40f7

Author: VLB_token
Title: [ANN] [ICO] VLB - Vehicle Lifecycle Blockchain
Body: HEADER   Vehicle Lifecycle Blockchain will unite numerous car related industries into an integrated system and create a decentralized platform of all records related to vehicle lifecycle from the production floor to the junk yard. VLB will cut costs and inefficiencies in the auto industry for the benefit of individuals and businesses and, more importantly, save hundreds of thousands of jobs in the auto industry, while making cars safer and more reliable, without the long-term anticipation of automation, electrification and mobility platform development.        ICO TERMS            PARTNERS       GET IN TOUCH
